name: maktbty
description: Library Management SystemA simple system to streamline library operations:Book Management: Add, edit, delete books, and track availability.Member Management: Register members, assign IDs, and track borrowing history.Lending System: Issue and return books with automated status updates and overdue tracking.Admin Features: Manage books, members, and loans with an intuitive interface and generate activity reports.Built with Node.js, EJS, and MySQL, using the MVC architecture for scalability and maintainability.
author: Mostafa Hesham Bashir
